__comment:
If no paths are specified, pyright defaults to the directory that contains the config file. 
                Paths may contain wildcard characters 
                ** (a directory or multiple levels of directories),
                * (a sequence of zero or more characters),
                ? (a single character).

Paths of directories or files that should not be considered part of the project.
                If not specified, Pyright automatically excludes the following.
Additional search paths that will be used when searching for modules imported by files.
